short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transliterate from Latin (English) alphabet to Ukrainian as you type. Use F4 to switch to Ukrainian while in a text field.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Press F4 in most text fields to start typing in Ukrainian.

Some of the tricky letters:

ji -> ї 
je -> є 
ju -> ю 
ch -> ч
zh -> ж
sh -> ш
w -> щ
' -> ь 
q -> '

Use plus sign if you need prevent compound letters:

s+hody -> сходи (instead of shody -> шоди)

Слава Україні!
